title: Liam Hemsworth gets battered and bloody on set of new TV series

Liam Hemsworth has been keeping himself busy with work as he goes through his split from long-term sweetheart Miley Cyrus.

Proving his latest project Dodge and Miles will be a an adrenaline-fuelled action show, the Australian hunk, 29, has been spotted looking battered, bruised and bloody as he filmed scenes in Toronto, Canada this week.

In order to look as if he had been in a brawl, the actor was made-up with gory make-up that successfully made it seem that he had been involved in a violent fight.

His knuckles were covered in bright red blood and the side of his face appeared to be sore with the help of prosthetic cuts and oozing wounds.

Liam's character was dressed in navy chinos and a grey top that featured a collar which he later whipped off to expose his ripped physique as he strolled around in a white vest top as the cameras rolled.

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

His time on set comes after reports he is "ready to date again" after his split from Miley.

A source said: "He hasn't been dating anyone, but he's open to meeting people," according to US Weekly.

In August Liam filed for divorce from Miley , according to US reports.

TMZ said Liam has filed legal documents citing "irreconcilable differences."

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

Sources close to the couple told the site that they had a prenup, meaning their earnings during the marriage are separate.

That means there won't be any fighting over money.

Miley and Liam announced their separation on August 10.

A spokesperson for Miley told People : "Liam and Miley have agreed to separate at this time.

(Image: GoffPhotos.com)

"Ever-evolving, changing as partners and individuals, they have decided this is what’s best while they both focus on themselves and careers.

They still remain dedicated parents to all of their animals they share while lovingly taking this time apart.

"Please respect their process and privacy."

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

Not long after that, Miley was pictures kissing friend Kaitlynn Carter in Lake Como and now she is dating Cody Simpson.

Miley and Liam tied the knot in December in a stunning low-key ceremony, 10 years after they met on the set of movie The Last Song.

But after a decade-long on-off relationship, it's all over.
description: The Australian actor has been seen filming some gory scenes for his upcoming TV show Dodge and Miles
